title: Leeds United Live: Leeds United 1-0 Bristol City - BBC News
summary: all the action and reaction as leeds united take on championship rivals bristol city .
no chris wood for unchanged leeds .
doukara scores third goal in four games to give united lead .

documents.title: good evevingleeds 1-0 bristol
text: a win is a win , as they say , but leeds did n't make it easy for themselves .
soulemayne doukara scored his third goal in four games , but leeds were down on energy and creativity for at least 45 minutes .
you can listen to our post-match interview with steve evans here , as his side are now 11 points off the play-offs and 11 points clear of the drop zone .
we 'll be back on tuesday for the clash away at brentford - thank you for joining us , and have a very good evening .

documents.title: more from evansleeds 1-0 bristol
text: `` chris wood could have been sold five times in this window , '' steve evans told bbc radio leeds .
`` we missed him for the last five or six games and i was worried that i would put him under testing conditions and he would injure himself .
`` he came in and hugged me and said he felt good , that 's a great sign for all of us .
he wanted to start but i thought it was a fraction too early .
`` i think for the last 25 minutes , lewis cook was outstanding .
it was important that we won at elland road .
good teams do n't normally lose three games in a row - you might lose two , but not three .
`` i said at half time , if we score , we 're not losing the game .
we have a clean sheet - let 's get used to delivering clean sheets at elland road . ''

documents.title: reaction from steve evansleeds 1-0 bristol
text: steve evans has been talking to bbc radio leeds about today 's game .
`` it was n't very nice , what i said at half-time , but you have to tell them .
the first half was like 45 minutes waiting at the dentist !
`` i 'm pleased for big solly because he takes a lot of stick .
he worked hard in the first half and now he 's got the goal in a win .
`` it was flat all round this week , maybe with sam going .
there is a lot to be pleased about though .
they are looking to the coach to lead them .
i was heavily critical of the first half , then i told them about what it means to grind out a 1-0 win . ''

documents.title: more from noelleeds 1-0 bristol
text: we start slow and when you 're playing in third gear , you 're a beatable side .
it was probably one of the most unconvincing performances i 've seen this season yet we 've come away with a win and a clean sheet .
there 's so much there that needs to be approved because against a better side , it would have been a different result today .
the first half was like they 'd played three games in three days - there was no energy , no creativity and the body language was all wrong .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: noel on today 's gameleeds 1-0 bristol
text: it is three points on the board and it is what we wanted from today 's game .
it 's three points from a very average performance .
it was n't pretty on the eye , but if you do n't play 100 % and still manage to get a win , you 've done your job .
when chris wood came on he was excellent and he was a bit of a game changer for united .
he was part of the goal and just his presence in the box made it a different kind of game for bristol .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: full time : leeds 1-0 bristol
text: it was n't easy or pretty but leeds have managed to register their first league victory for six games .
it was a long old slog for the fans , with leeds not really waking up until after soulemayne doukara had bundled the ball past richard o'donnell .

text: well that goal seems to have come from nowhere - as is often the case with leeds !

documents.title: the season so farleeds v bristol
text: it 's been a funny old season for leeds so far , with a few ups and plenty of downs .
united are currently 17th in the championship , 13 points away from the play-offs - but just eight clear of the drop zone .
a loss today would leave them five points clear of the bottom half , but leeds are without a win in their last five league games .
with sam byram gone , the whites are in desperate need of a striker , otherwise they may find themselves in a relegation battle .

documents.title: raynor on bristol cityleeds v bristol
text: before kick-off , assistant head coach paul raynor cast his eye over bristol city - and he reckoned today 's game would be a tough ask .
`` we feel as though we need to raise the tempo , '' raynor told adam pope .
`` we 're not a management team that sits off and allows people to play .
we want to dictate the tempo and we feel as though it is starting to come .
`` bristol are a very adventurous side .
they have some young , energetic players and their midfield plays with a lot of pace and power . ''
leeds could do with a tempo boost any time soon !

documents.title: noel on the first halfleeds 0-0 bristol
text: i really do n't know where to start .
we have n't moved the ball quick enough , we 've been sloppy - it has been a poor start .
i was expecting them to really come out of the blocks .
we have to start mixing it up a bit and thinking about how we can start playing our game .
the atmosphere is flat , the performance is flat - there is nothing to get excited about in these first 45 minutes .
there is no energy .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: half time : leeds 0-0 bristol
text: enthralling football it ai n't - that 's a pretty average half of football from leeds united , who are booed off the pitch .
bristol city have been the better team , particularly jonathan kodjia , who has wormed his way through the leeds ' defense with worrying ease .
let us know your thoughts , leeds fans , if you can bear it - tweet us @ wysdaily

documents.title: leeds and the football leagueleeds v bristol
text: the drama between leeds and the football league has flared up again this week as yet another fixture was rearranged .
the championship game between leeds and middlesbrough will now take place on monday 15 february , rather than saturday 13 .
the football league issued a statement , stating that they regretted the late changing of the fixture .
`` however , as was referenced by leeds united .

in its statement of the 29th december , '' it read , `` the club has challenged the league 'through the appropriate legal routes ' , which has prevented confirmation of the date of this fixture until now . ''

documents.title: eye on the oppositionleeds v bristol
text: bristol have n't had the best of luck against leeds united , having lost their last three games at elland road .
chris wood loves playing against the robins , having scored four goals in five games against them .
city 's away record this season makes for happy reading for leeds fans .
in their last three , they have failed to score and let in nine goals .
with 13 defeats and 46 goals conceded , bristol average less than a goal a game .

documents.title: last time outleeds v bristol
text: leeds ' defence was left red-faced when these two sides last met in august .
leeds were 2-0 up for 89 minutes , thanks to mirco antenucci 's penalty and chris wood 's strike .
then substitute kieran agard found the net a minute before extra time , before an aden flint backheel in the 90th minute secured a point for bristol .
uwe rosler was not impressed afterwards - and leeds will be hoping to avoid a similar fate today .

documents.title: view from the boxleeds v bristol
text: pre match warm up leeds v bristol city mot

documents.title: `` anything can happen for us '' leeds v bristol
text: stuart dallas has urged leeds fans not to give up on the team this season .
the midfielder , who has scored once in 34 appearances for the whites , wants to take things one game at a time .
`` i 've seen people writing us off but if you put a run together , anything can happen , '' he told bbc radio leeds .
`` the boys are really positive .
we have a good squad here and a huge month coming up .
`` if we can get three positive results then we will be looking up .
it 's going to be tough but there 's no reason why we ca n't do it . ''

documents.title: hello , diagouragaleeds v bristol
text: as one leaves , another enters , with toumani diagouraga set to join leeds on a permanent basis .
diagouraga will be steve evans first permanent signing once he has undergone a medical over the weekend .
the 6ft midfielder previously played at peterborough and brentford , where he made 190 appearances for the championship side .

documents.title: popey on what leeds are missingleeds v bristol
text: i 've always liked diagouraga .
he was a strong presence playing for hereford in the 2-0 win over leeds seven years ago .
according to my colleagues , he can carry the ball upfield well and he has an eye for a pass but does n't score many .
i do wonder if his arrival means tom adeyemi will end up returning to cardiff from his season long loan to go elsewhere .
i still think a striker is needed in the window - lee erwin really has to step up and keep wood and doukara under pressure .
he will never have a better chance to stake a claim .
author: Adam Pope
BBC West Yorkshire Sport

documents.title: `` if we had been in the top three , sam might have stayed '' leeds v bristol
text: assistant head coach paul raynor has been speaking to bbc radio leeds about sam byram 's departure .
`` it was inevitable he was going to go in this window , i do n't think anyone doubted that , '' raynor told adam pope .
`` nobody wanted sam to go - i know the gaffer tried to extremely hard to convince him to sign a new contract - but it was better to get him on his way and it 's a great move for him .
`` if we were in the top three , i think sam might have stayed at leeds and been a part of it moving forward . ''

documents.title: popey on byramleeds v bristol
text: sam byram 's departure is a blow .
i hate seeing talented young players leave the club , and i was disappointed he did n't join everton too .
my best memory of sam is that he was a joy to deal with .
he is an absolutely lovely lad who has time for people .
you would want eleven sam byram 's in your team .
on the pitch i would his header at reading last february as my favourite commentary moment .
it was a night where we expected very little but he delivered so much .
author: Adam Pope
BBC West Yorkshire Sport

documents.title: goodbye , sam leeds v bristol
text: sam byram has made his last appearance in a leeds united shirt after he joined west ham this week on a four-and-a-half year deal .
byram was one of leeds ' most experienced players , having been with the academy since he was 11 .
he was clearly quite sad to say goodbye to his childhood club , as his twitter message to the fans showed .
with 143 appearances and ten goals to his name , how big a loss will he be to leeds united ?
a message for everyone at leeds

documents.title: noel on today 's teamleeds v bristol
text: the question i always ask is - if chris wood is fit enough to be on the bench , why is n't he starting ?
doukara has grabbed a couple of goals in his games so he does deserve his opportunity .
they need to convert their chances today - the first 45 minutes at sheffield , they were in the game but they could n't get the ball into the back of the net .
lewis cook got himself into some very good areas and that 's what we need , more midfield players trying to get in there and score goals .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: get involvedleeds v bristol
text: what are your thoughts on the sam byram situation , leeds fans ?
sad to see him go ?
happy with today 's team , or would you prefer to see doukara given some support up front ?
send us your tweets throughout the game @ twitterid

documents.title: breakingteam newsleeds v bristol
text: leeds are unchanged from their loss against sheffield wednesday , which means the same formation .
chris wood is on the bench , hoping to make his first appearance in four games after a hamstring injury , while alex mowatt is missing all together with injury .
leeds united xi : silvestri , wootton , bellusci , cooper , taylor , dallas , bridcutt , murphy , cook , carayol , doukara .
bristol city xi : o'donnell , ayling , flint , baker , bryan , burns , gladwin , pack , smith , freeman , kodjia .

documents.title: periscope previewleeds v bristol
text: if you missed our # lufc preview with @ twitterid & @ twitterid watch again here @ twitterid

documents.title: start of a new era ? leeds v bristol
text: good afternoon , and welcome to today 's live text commentary of leeds united v bristol city .
it 's not been a great week for leeds fans , with a dispiriting loss against sheffield wednesday and sam byram officially moving to west ham .
today might go better for them as they face third from bottom bristol city , who have lost their last three away games .
keep an eye on us here while you listen to our commentary on 92.4 fm , dab and freeview channel 719 to see if leeds can get back to winning ways .
